Schwarzkopf Ultimate Shine (400 ml)

Supersoft ? strengthens and cares down to the tips. Proven effectiveness: Supersoft gives the hair back what it has lost. With time hair loses protein and in turn can become dull and weak. Supersoft with intensive-care-protein regenerates the hair structure by replacing the protein that has been lost making hair more smooth
column14: supple and healthy. The formula with Shine-Reflex-System & UV-Filter protects the hair colour from fading. It provides extra long-lasting colour protection and intensive shine. It smoothes and cares for the hair structure of coloured. The result: Up to 3x better combability & radiant
column15: long-lasting colour shine. Application: Massage gently into wet hair after shampooing. Rinse thoroughly. For best results use with Supersoft Colour Shine Red Berries Conditioner. Skin compatibility dermatologically proven. Discover our other great products in the Supersoft range which include a Colour Protect Red Berries Shampoo for coloured
column17: Volume Boost Apple Shampoo & Conditioner for fine
column19: Repair & Care Coconut Shampoo & Conditioner for dry & damaged hair
column20: Ultimate Shine Superfruit Shampoo & Conditioner for dull and unmanageable hair and a Supersoft For Men Shampoo for normal hair.
